plot outline: Bala is a promising cricketer .But his police officer father wants him to join police force like him.Bala runs away from his house due to strictness of his father and roams around streets of Mumbai with homeless kids. His parents search him all over the city and his father also puts police force behind him.Bala his aware of every move and avoids everything and reaches his village in Kudal to his grandfather who seeks help of his friend and former cricketer Ajit Wadekar to train him.
title: Baalaa
plot: Balaa is a Marathi movie starring Upendra Limaye, Kranti Redkar, Vikram Gokhale and Suhasini Mulay in prominent roles. It is a drama directed and written by Sachindra Sharma with Rakesh Singh as producer, forming part of the crew.

Bala is a promising cricketer .But his police officer father wants him to join police force like him.Bala runs away from his house due to strictness of his father and roams around streets of Mumbai with homeless kids.
